This is the width (in rows) of the Cellular Automata grid.
This is the height (in columns) of the Cellular Automata grid --- set the height to 1 for 1-dimensional Cellular Automata.
This is the cell of interest. If a rule matches a pattern, this cell is turned on.
These are the cellular automata rules. If a rule's pattern is matched, then the cell of interest turned on.
